revealedTestimonial.onExerciseInTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the exercise and track associated with the testimonial.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Testimonials List → Individual Testimonial Card (below student handle)
**When Users See This**: When viewing a revealed testimonial in the list.
**Technical Context**: Variables `exerciseTitle` and `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "on %{exerciseTitle} in %{trackTitle}"
revealedTestimonial.new:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating a new testimonial.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Testimonials List → Individual Testimonial Card (top right corner of info block)
**When Users See This**: When a newly revealed testimonial appears in the list.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "New"
